mapper.insert: insert into member (id, pass, email, name, reg_date, age, gender) values(#{id}, #{pass}, #{email}, #{name}, #{reg_date}, #{age}, #{gender})
mapper.select: select pass from member where id=#{id};
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, age=#{age}, gender=#{gender} where id=#{id}
